body.name: Bubble Skincare Bounce Back Balancing Toner Facial Mist - Willow Bark + Niacinamide Toner for Texture and Radiance Reset - Sea Water Pore Minimizer Facial Mist Spray (55ml)
features: Back to Balance Toner Spray - Bubble's Bounce Back hydrating toner mist instantly resets skin, adding moisture and balance while cutting back mid-day shine. Throw it in your bag and stay toned on-the-go.
Sea Water Pore Minimizer - Sea water works wonders in this oily skin toner to mattify uneven texture. Willow bark extract gently exfoliates, cleansing pores while not disturbing the skin.
Face Brightening Refresh - Our niacinamide brightening toner with sodium PCA supports skin texture and radiance while working to protect skin against daily environment stressors
On-the-Go Face Spray - Bring softer, smoother, skin support along for the ride with this travel essential daily pore toner.
For Every Skin Type - An ultra-mobile Fragrance-Free facial spray for oily skin needing shine reduction. Gentle enough to be used as a dry, combination, and acne-prone sensitive skin toner.
body.description: Spray on this easy-to-use facial toner and keep rolling. This spray-on skin toner instantly resets skin, Use this skin care toner to add hydration and balance while cutting back mid-day shine. Throw it in your bag and stay toned on-the-go. Bubble's Bounce Back Balancing pore toner mist works as a face toner for sensitive skin to support your skin reset. No makeup is needed, this skincare toner does the work of pore minimizing and oil balancing. This natural skin toner contains ingredients like Sea Water. This helpful ingredient works as a hydrating agent in this spray toner for face reset. Helps mattify and reduce the appearance of pores in this face toner spray. Sodium PCA + Niacinamide helps improve texture and radiance. Willow Bark Extract gently exfoliates while calming redness and reducing oiliness in this toner for oily skin. Try other Bubble pore minimizer products to support your skin's even texture. This fast-acting face toner for women, men, and teens will restore your face in a pinch. Bubble's face mist hydrating toner is here for your daily hydrating needs.*

Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Arrived in time and was the perfect gift for my granddaughter!! Thanks

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: With my daughter getting into skincare I wanted to provide her with all the products she'd need from one line. I chose Bubble because the ingredients looked good and the set felt like it was just what she needed.This toner mist is great to use after cleansing or throughout the day for a refreshing boost to your skin. The bottle is really cute and the sprayer produces a lovely mist that's light and feels great on the skin. It doesn't feel sticky or tacky and absorbs well into the skin.My daughter has been using this along with their cleanser, serum, and moisturizer and has noticed a great improvement in her skin. She's had no adverse reactions and has been enjoying how easy it is to use each of the products in the line. This mist is her favorite because she doesn't care for using toners that come in bottles you have to pour from.The bottle is cute and fun and the product is of great quality. The price is a little high for how much you receive, but it is working great on my daughter's skin.
